Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, this may have already been done before. But this is the catch, you have to use an Aircraft, and no cheats.You may land at the island, but you don't have to land. Here is My Entry: 1 minute and 20 seconds (1:20). Edit: Also it has to have no liquid/oxidizer or SRBs. 

Edited January 23, 2017 by DunaManiac

So what's the challenge?

 Is there a scoreboard?  

What about mods?

What do you want us to do? Landing or no landing? There and back or only there? If landing is not required then when exactly should we record our time? What mods, if any, are allowed? So many questions...

Edited January 23, 2017 by tseitsei89

6 hours ago, tseitsei89 said:

What do you want us to do? Landing or no landing? There and back or only there? If landing is not required then when exactly should we record our time? What mods, if any, are allowed? So many questions...

Tseitsei89, landing is optional. No mods, (Except visualization mods like scatterer, etc.) The time is recorded exactly when the aircraft is over the island. Sorry,  

9 hours ago, linuxgurugamer said:

So what's the challenge?

 Is there a scoreboard?  

What about mods?

Linuxgurugamer, the challenge is to get to the island (the one with the Airway) as fast as possible in a aircraft specifically. No Rockets, only jets powering the aircraft. You can land, if you have a really fast aircraft. Let me know if you have any more questions.

Can it be a drone? Does the plane have to survive? Does it even have to touch the ground (or can we record our time as it shoots high over the island at mach 100)? If it has to land and survive, can it still lose parts on impact with the ground (i.e. partially blow up, but at least 1 part survives)? Do the wings have to generate lift (with high speeds you don't really need wings). Can we drop tanks/engines (i.e. use stages)? Where exactly does the clock stop?

Also, your own entry isn't visible (anymore)...
